PRAYER IS A WEAPON AGAINST SATAN.\97Beware how you neglect secret prayer and a study of God\92s word. These are your weapons 
271
against him who is striving to hinder your progress heavenward. The first neglect of prayer and Bible study makes easier the second neglect. The first resistance to the Spirit\92s pleading prepares the way for the second resistance. Thus the heart is hardened, and the conscience seared.\97(Messages to Young People, 96.)
